segments.text: Over to the left, I see the children, engaged in their own little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself, reaching high into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside that cabinet, I can clearly make out a “COOKIE JAR” filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside the jar, no doubt grabbing a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to collect his bounty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands below, reaching up with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually quite endearing to see their teamwork for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart skips a beat noticing how unstable that stool looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it seems like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent mischief carries such a clear risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
